sections.title: Building\b\t\bDo\f\tin-Specific\bDocu\fent\bCollection\bfor\bEv\tlu\tting\bMet\td\tt\t\b Effects\bon\bInfor\f\ttion\bRetriev\tl\b W\tlid\bM\tgdy,\bJin\fing\bMin,\bJoh\tnnes\bLeveling,\bG\treth\bJ.F.\bJones\b
paragraphs: Centre f\br \text Gener\fti\bn L\bc\flis\fti\bn Sch\b\bl \bf C\bmputing Dublin City University
Dublin, Irel\fnd

{wm\fgdy, jmin, jleveling, gj\bnes}@c\bmputing.dcu.ie Abstr\tct\b\b This p\fper describes the devel\bpment \bf \f structured d\bcument c\bllecti\bn c\bnt\fining user-gener\fted text \fnd numeric\fl met\fd\ft\f f\br expl\bring the expl\bit\fti\bn \bf met\fd\ft\f in inf\brm\fti\bn retriev\fl (IR). The c\bllecti\bn c\bnsists \bf m\bre th\fn 61,000 d\bcuments extr\fcted fr\bm Y\buTube vide\b p\fges \bn b\fsketb\fll in gener\fl \fnd \tBA (\t\fti\bn\fl B\fsketb\fll Ass\bci\fti\bn) in p\frticul\fr, t\bgether with \f set \bf 40 t\bpics \fnd their relev\fnce judgements. In \fdditi\bn, \f c\bllecti\bn \bf ne\frly 250,000 user pr\bfiles rel\fted t\b the \tBA c\bllecti\bn is \fv\fil\fble. Sever\fl b\fseline IR experiments rep\brt the effect \bf using vide\b-\fss\bci\fted met\fd\ft\f \bn retriev\fl effectiveness. The results surprisingly sh\bw th\ft se\frching the vide\bs titles \bnly perf\brms signific\fntly better th\fn se\frching \fdditi\bn\fl met\fd\ft\f text fields \bf the vide\bs such \fs the t\fgs \br the descripti\bn.

sections.title: 1. Introduction\b
paragraphs: A huge \fm\bunt \bf c\bmmunity-gener\fted d\ft\f is being cre\fted \bn the web. Web bl\bgs, im\fges, vide\bs, \fnd even Wikipedi\f \fre ex\fmples \bf this r\fpidly gr\bwing d\ft\f. The n\fture \bf this d\ft\f is different in type \fnd c\bntent fr\bm st\fnd\frd web p\fges. Finding efficient meth\bds f\br se\frching this kind \bf d\ft\f bec\bmes \f gr\bwing dem\fnd, \fnd using these res\burces \fs l\fngu\fge res\burces h\fs f\bund much \fttenti\bn recently. A vide\b websites such \fs Y\buTube1

is \bne \bf these s\burces \bf d\ft\f. The Y\buTube website c\bnt\fins milli\bns \bf vide\bs th\ft \fre upl\b\fded by users t\b sh\fre it with everyb\bdy using the web. Vide\bs \bn Y\buTube \fre \fss\bci\fted with \f huge \fm\bunt \bf met\fd\ft\f \fb\but the c\bntent \bf the vide\b, \fnd this met\fd\ft\f is gener\fted by the p\bster \bf the vide\b (vide\b title \fnd t\fgs). In \fdditi\bn, s\bme different kind \bf met\fd\ft\f is gener\fted \bver time \fb\but the p\bpul\frity \bf the vide\b itself (e.g. r\fting \fnd number \bf views).  In this p\fper, we present design \bf \fn inf\brm\fti\bn retriev\fl (IR) test c\bllecti\bn b\fsed \bn \f sn\fpsh\bt \bf \f c\bllecti\bn \bf vide\b web p\fges fr\bm Y\buTube. The c\bllecti\bn \bf vide\b p\fges w\fs cr\fwled in the peri\bd bef\bre 03/03/2009. The c\bllecti\bn is cre\fted f\br the specific d\bm\fin \bf b\fsketb\fll t\b \fll\bw rese\frch \bn d\bm\fin-specific d\ft\f. All different types \bf the d\ft\f \fnd met\fd\ft\f \fss\bci\fted with vide\bs were c\fptured \fnd st\bred.  Sever\fl experiments h\fve been c\bnducted t\b test the us\fge \bf different fields \bf the \fss\bci\fted met\fd\ft\f \bn the effectiveness \bf IR. The results surprisingly sh\bw th\ft using sh\brt fields, such \fs the title \bf vide\bs, f\br indexing the d\ft\f \fchieves signific\fntly higher retriev\fl effectiveness th\fn when using \fdditi\bn\fl text th\ft \i \i \i 1 http://www.y\butube.c\bm describes the c\bntent \bf the vide\b, such \fs vide\b t\fgs \fnd descripti\bn.  The d\ft\f c\bnsists \bf 61,340 XML d\bcuments representing the vide\b p\fges, 40 t\bpics with c\brresp\bnding m\fnu\fl relev\fnce \fssessments t\b en\fble IR experiments, \fnd 250k user pr\bfiles. These user pr\bfiles \fre f\br every user wh\b h\fs inter\fcted with the vide\bs (p\bsted the vide\b \br c\bmmented \bn it), \fnd it c\frries s\bme inf\brm\fti\bn \fb\but users such \fs, \fge, gender, l\bc\fti\bn, \fnd m\fy be h\bbbies. The d\ft\f structure m\btiv\ftes its us\fge in v\fri\bus rese\frch fields, including inf\brm\fti\bn retriev\fl, \fd\fptive hypermedi\f, inf\brm\fti\bn extr\fcti\bn, \bnt\bl\bgy gener\fti\bn, sentiment \fn\flysis, \fnd \bthers.  The rest \bf this p\fper is \brg\fnized \fs f\bll\bws: Secti\bn 2 intr\bduces s\bme rel\fted w\brk f\br the us\fge \bf this kind \bf d\ft\f; Secti\bn 3 expl\fins the ch\fr\fcteristics \bf the d\ft\f \fnd describes the meth\bd\bl\bgy used f\br cr\fwling it; Secti\bn 4 describes the cre\fti\bn \bf the t\bpics \fnd the relev\fnce \fssessments; Secti\bn 5 discusses the experiment\fl setup \fnd rep\brts the b\fseline results; Secti\bn 6 discusses the \fpplic\fbility \bf the pr\bvided d\ft\f f\br vide\b retriev\fl rese\frch; fin\flly, Secti\bn 7 c\bncludes the p\fper \fnd pr\bvides the link t\b \bbt\fin the d\ft\f c\bllecti\bn.

sections.title: 2. Rel\tted\bWork\b
paragraphs: Y\buTube h\fs \flw\fys been \fn interesting s\burce f\br rese\frch \fb\but user-gener\fted c\bntent in different fields. S\bme rese\frch f\bcused \bn the efficiency \bf using this huge \fm\bunt \bf d\ft\f by checking the best meth\bds f\br c\fching se\frch results \br vide\b links (Ch\f et \fl., 2007; Gill et \fl., 2007). Furtherm\bre, s\bme rese\frch h\fs f\bcused \bn the trend \bf using the c\bntent, such \fs user beh\fvi\bur f\br se\frch \fnd vide\b p\bpul\frity (Cheng et \fl., 2008). Other w\brk tested the trend \bf users’ interest by m\bnit\bring the

results \bf 57 queries \bn Y\buTube f\br eight m\bnths \fb\but the US 2008 presidenti\fl electi\bn (C\fpr\f et \fl., 2008). Simil\fr w\brk tried t\b predict the US presidenti\fl electi\bn thr\bugh pr\bviding \f t\b\bl f\br h\frvesting vide\bs rel\fted t\b the electi\bn, \fnd \fn\flysing user inter\fcti\bns with it (Sh\fh \fnd M\frchi\bnini, 2007; Sh\fh, 2009).  Different rese\frch f\bcused \bn the effectiveness p\frt \bf se\frching Y\buTube (Yee et \fl., 2009). The rese\frch c\bnducted the current pr\fctice t\b se\frch f\br vide\bs b\fsed \bn titles, t\fgs, \fnd descripti\bn. It sh\bwed th\ft inc\brp\br\fting the t\bp c\bmment terms int\b the index pr\bcessing c\fn impr\bve se\frch \fccur\fcy by \bver 10%. An\bther w\brk, tried t\b utilize extern\fl res\burces such \fs W\brd\tet t\b enrich the descripti\bn \bf \fnn\bt\fti\bns \bf vide\bs in \brder t\b get better retrieved results (Alt\fdmiri \fnd Ahmed, 2009). This w\brk sh\bwed the effectiveness in c\brrecting s\bme misspelled w\brds in the \fnn\bt\fti\bn \bf vide\bs, which led t\b impr\bvement in the retriev\fl rec\fll.  In this p\fper, we present \f new ev\flu\fti\bn d\ft\f c\bllecti\bn designed especi\flly f\br IR, but c\fn be utilized in different rese\frch fields \fs well. The pr\bvided c\bllecti\bn f\bcuses \bn \bne d\bm\fin \bf vide\bs \bnly, \fnd is c\bnsidered much l\frger th\fn the \bnes used in (Yee et \fl., 2009) \fnd (Alt\fdmiri \fnd Ahmed, 2009), which b\bth c\bnsist \bf less th\fn 10,000 d\bcuments. The size \bf d\ft\f set sh\buld le\fd t\b better reli\fble results \ft le\fst f\br d\bm\fin specific rese\frch.

sections.title: 3. D\tt\t\bH\trvesting\b 2.1\b D\tt\t\bCh\tr\tcteristics\b
paragraphs: Y\buTube vide\b p\fges c\bnstitute \f very interesting type \bf
d\ft\f f\br IR experiments due t\b their speci\fl n\fture which
is ch\fr\fcterized by:
1. Sh\brt d\bcuments (vide\b titles).
2. A r\fnge \bf f\bur types \bf met\fd\ft\f: - Textu\fl (t\fgs, c\bmments, \fnd descripti\bn). - \tumeric\fl (vide\b length, \fver\fge r\fting; \fnd the
number \bf views, r\ftings, f\fv\brited, c\bmments, \fnd
vide\b resp\bnses). - Rel\fti\bn\fl (vide\b resp\bnses, \fnd rel\fted vide\bs2
). - Additi\bn\fl (vide\b c\fteg\bry, p\bsting user, p\bsting
d\fte, \fnd l\fst upd\fting d\fte) This \fll\bws investig\fting \fnd ev\flu\fting n\bvel IR meth\bds, which m\fke use \bf met\fd\ft\f.

3. C\bmmunity-cre\fted d\ft\f th\ft c\bnt\fins r\ftings, c\bmments, replies, \fnd resp\bnses. This en\fbles rese\frch in s\bci\fl medi\f in gener\fl.  Figure 1 sh\bws the structure \bf \f Y\buTube vide\b p\fge \fnd \fll the \fss\bci\fted met\fd\ft\f. This c\bmbin\fti\bn \bf v\fried met\fd\ft\f t\fgs \fnd vide\b c\bntent pr\bvides \f rich envir\bnment f\br multimedi\f IR rese\frch. \i \i \i 2 Rel\fted vide\bs c\bnsist \bf \f list \bf vide\bs which is gener\fted \fut\bm\ftic\flly by Y\buTube. Rel\fted vide\bs h\fve c\bntent with the current vide\b. Resp\bnded vide\bs \fre vide\bs p\bsted by different users \fs \f resp\bnse t\b the current vide\b.  A specific d\bm\fin w\fs selected f\br this c\bllecti\bn in \brder t\b h\fve \f f\bcused set \bf d\ft\f suit\fble f\br rese\frch in different fields, which \fre typic\flly expl\bred sep\fr\ftely with different d\ft\fsets. The b\fsketb\fll \tBA d\bm\fin w\fs ch\bsen in specific bec\fuse l\frge \fm\bunts \bf suit\fble c\bntent \fre \fv\fil\fble \bn Y\buTube, including \f l\frge number \bf p\bsted vide\bs \fnd rel\fted c\bmments, \fl\bng with \f l\frge c\bmmunity \bf f\fns f\br this type \bf sp\brt.

sections.title: 2.2\b D\tt\t\bCr\twling\bMethodology\b&\bSt\ttistics\b
paragraphs: A t\bt\fl \bf 61,340 vide\b p\fges \bn Y\buTube were cr\fwled f\br this c\bllecti\bn. E\fch vide\b p\fge c\bnt\fins the link t\b the \brigin\fl s\burce p\fge, en\fbling the p\bssibility \bf \fccessing the \brigin\fl vide\b \br upd\fting the cr\fwled vide\b p\fge itself. 50 seed queries rel\fted t\b the \tBA were used t\b se\frch the Y\buTube; these queries were gener\fted fr\bm the t\bp 15 r\fnked \tBA pl\fyers in se\fs\bn 2008, plus the 29 \tBA te\fms \fl\bng with 6 m\bre \tBA gener\fl queries such \fs, e.g. BA, Mich\b\tl \ford\bn.  The cr\fwling \fnd prep\fr\fti\bn \bf the c\bllecti\bn w\fs perf\brmed f\bll\bwing sever\fl steps: 1. The t\bp 700 results links f\br e\fch \bf the 50 seed
queries were extr\fcted. At the time \bf cr\fwling
Y\buTube se\frch w\fs pr\bviding 800 results \ft m\bst (40
result p\fges, e\fch c\bnt\fins 20 results), \fnd s\bmetimes
the full list \fre n\bt c\bmplete. Theref\bre, we selected
700 results t\b \fssure n\b f\filure t\b \bur cr\fwler. 2. F\br e\fch result, the t\bp 20 rel\fted vide\b resp\bnses \fnd
the first 20 rel\fted vide\bs links were extr\fcted. 3. All unique vide\b p\fge links were listed. 4. The Y\buTube p\fge \bf e\fch vide\b p\fge link w\fs
cr\fwled in \fdditi\bn t\b the gd\ft\f p\fges3
. Gd\ft\f p\fges
\fre \fdditi\bn\fl p\fges f\br the vide\b which \fre designed
f\br devel\bpers, \fnd c\frry s\bme extr\f inf\brm\fti\bn
\fb\but the vide\b n\bt \fppe\fring \bn the Y\buTube p\fge. 5. All met\fd\ft\f fields sh\bwn in Figure 1 were extr\fcted,
limiting the number \bf rel\fted vide\bs \fnd vide\b
resp\bnses t\b 20 e\fch, \fnd the first 500 c\bmments were
cr\fwled \fl\bng the p\bsting user ID 6. F\br e\fch vide\b p\fge, the extr\fcted d\ft\f w\fs s\fved in
XML f\brm\ft. S\fmple is sh\bwn in Figure 2. 7. All vide\b p\fges \bf \bther c\fteg\bries \bther th\fn
“Sp\brts” were filtered \but 8. The pr\bfiles \bf p\bsting users f\br \fll vide\bs \fnd
c\bmments were cr\fwled \fnd s\fved \fs \f sep\fr\fte
c\bllecti\bn \bf user pr\bfiles c\bnsisting \bf ne\frly

250,000 unique users.  The peri\bd \bf d\ftes \bf the p\bsted vide\bs in the c\bllecti\bn w\fs f\bund t\b be between 13/09/2005 \fnd 03/03/2009. T\fble 1 sh\bws s\bme st\ftistics \bf the c\bllecti\bn including inf\brm\fti\bn \fb\but the distributi\bn \bf the v\flues \bf the met\fd\ft\f \fss\bci\fted with the vide\bs. \i \i \i 3 http://c\bde.g\b\bgle.c\bm/\fpis/y\butube/getting_st\frted.html#d\ft\f _\fpi

sections.title: 1370 4. Topics\b\tnd\bRelev\tnce\bAssess\fent\b
paragraphs: 40 t\bpics \bn \tBA were cre\fted t\b supp\brt IR experiments \bn the \tBA c\bllecti\bn. These t\bpics were designed t\b be much m\bre specific th\fn the queries used f\br cr\fwling the c\bllecti\bn. T\bpic structure f\bll\bws th\ft \bf the st\fnd\frd TREC f\brm\ft, with e\fch \bne c\bnsisting \bf \f title, descripti\bn, \fnd n\frr\ftive field, in \fdditi\bn t\b \f unique t\bpic ID. A s\fmple t\bpic is sh\bwn in Figure 3.  Figure 3: S\fmple t\bpic \bn the Y\buTube \tBA c\bllecti\bn  T\b perf\brm the relev\fnce judgements f\br e\fch t\bpic, \f p\b\bling meth\bd w\fs used (Buckley et \fl., 2006), merging different result lists c\bming fr\bm different se\frch meth\bds. The Lemur se\frch t\b\blkit (Ogilvie \fnd C\fll\fn, 2002) w\fs used t\b se\frch f\br e\fch query with 5 different m\bdels in 4 different indexes. The IR m\bdels used t\b gener\fte the results list were TFIDF, Ok\fpi, Re-r\fnk TFIDF, l\fngu\fge m\bdelling (LM) using Dirichlet sm\b\bthing, \fnd LM using c\bllecti\bn mixture meth\bd \fnd Dirichlet sm\b\bthing. The det\filed descripti\bn \bf these retriev\fl m\bdels c\fn be f\bund \bn the Lemur website4

. F\br \fll IR m\bdels, def\fult p\fr\fmeter settings were used.  F\bur different indexes were built in \brder t\b gener\fte v\fried retriev\fl results f\br \fssessment in the p\b\bling. These included c\bmbin\fti\bns between the textu\fl met\fd\ft\f \fss\bci\fted with e\fch vide\b p\fge. Title (TI), t\fgs (TA), descripti\bn (DE), \fnd rel\fted vide\bs titles (RE) were f\bund t\b be the best textu\fl met\fd\ft\f th\ft describes the c\bntent \bf the vide\b. Indexes were built c\bmbining fields \fs f\bll\bws: TI, TI+TA, TI+TA+DE, \fnd TI+TA+DE+RE.  The use \bf the different retriev\fl m\bdels with the f\bur index files led t\b 20 runs f\br e\fch query, me\fning th\ft 20 different result lists were gener\fted f\br e\fch t\bpic. The t\bp r\fnked 60 d\bcuments were retrieved f\br e\fch run. This c\buld p\btenti\flly result in 1,200 different d\bcuments t\b be judged in the w\brst c\fse scen\fri\b. H\bwever, in pr\fctice the number \bf unique d\bcuments w\fs f\fr l\bwer, \fnd the uni\bn \bf the 20 results lists led t\b between 122 \fnd 466 \i \i \i 4 http://www.lemurpr\bject.\brg/ d\bcuments t\b be judged f\br e\fch t\bpic.  A simple inter\fctive web-b\fsed IR \fpplic\fti\bn, sh\bwn in Figure 4, w\fs devel\bped f\br relev\fnce \fssess\brs t\b judge the results \bf e\fch query. The \fpplic\fti\bn \fll\bws \fssess\brs t\b see the det\fils \bf e\fch result including vide\b title, t\fgs, descripti\bn with \f link t\b the vide\b in \brder t\b w\ftch bef\bre judgment. Other met\fd\ft\f w\fs n\bt sh\bwn t\b the \fssess\br in \brder t\b \fv\bid \fny bi\fs t\b their decisi\bn. The present\fti\bn \brder \bf retriev\fl results w\fs r\fnd\bmized in \brder t\b ensure \f high level \bf \fttenti\bn by the \fssess\brs.  The number \bf relev\fnt d\bcuments (vide\b p\fges) f\br the t\bpics w\fs f\bund t\b r\fnge fr\bm 1 t\b 125 d\bcuments, with \fn \fver\fge \bf 23 relev\fnt d\bcuments per t\bpic.

sections.title: 5. Experi\fent\tl\bSetup\b&\bResults\b
paragraphs: Sever\fl b\fseline runs were perf\brmed t\b begin expl\br\fti\bn \bf the effect \bf se\frching the c\bllecti\bn with different fields in the vide\b p\fge. T\bpics were used t\b se\frch f\bur different indexes simil\fr t\b th\bse cre\fted in the p\b\bling step. In \brder t\b \fv\bid bi\fsed results t\b \fny \bf the m\bdels used in p\b\bling, the Indri se\frch t\b\blkit w\fs used t\b index \fnd se\frch the c\bllecti\bn. Indri c\bmbines inference netw\brk m\bdel with l\fngu\fge m\bdelling (Metzler \fnd Cr\bft, 2004). Pseud\b-relev\fnce feedb\fck (PRF) w\fs tested f\br its effectiveness \bn IR, t\fking 20 \fs the number \bf d\bcument \fnd feedb\fck terms.  Figures 5 \fnd 6 present the me\fn \fver\fge precisi\bn (MAP) \fnd rec\fll f\br the b\fseline runs f\br se\frching the c\bllecti\bn with the 4 indexes. The results sh\bw th\ft se\frching \bnly the vide\b titles pr\bduces the m\bst precise results, but \ft the s\fme time the l\bwest rec\fll. In \fdditi\bn, it w\fs \bbserved th\ft \fs m\bre text is indexed f\br e\fch vide\b p\fge, \f higher rec\fll is \fchieved (Figure 6). These results c\fn direct us f\br using m\bre text in indexes f\br \fchieving \f higher rec\fll; l\fter re-r\fnking \flg\brithms c\buld p\btenti\flly be \fpplied t\b \fchieve \f higher precisi\bn. B\bth figures illustr\fte th\ft st\fnd\frd PRF \flm\bst \flw\fys h\fs \f neg\ftive effect \bn the precisi\bn \fnd rec\fll \bf the retriev\fl pr\bcess f\br this d\ft\fset.  These results c\fn be seen \fs surprising in the first inst\fnce, since they sh\bw th\ft using m\bre text in indexes f\br se\frch le\fds l\bwer retriev\fl effectiveness. H\bwever, when checking the d\ft\f, it c\fn be seen th\ft usu\flly the vide\b title c\bnt\fins the m\bst precise sh\brt descripti\bn \bf the c\bntent \bf the vide\b. The t\fgs \fnd the descripti\bn fields typic\flly h\fve \f very det\filed descripti\bn, but c\fn be n\bisy bec\fuse they \fre user-gener\fted. This c\fn le\fd t\b imprecise se\frch results. In \fdditi\bn, using the titles \bf rel\fted vide\bs sh\bwed \fn impr\bvement in the perf\brm\fnce when \fdded t\b the text. H\bwever, when c\bmbining the vide\b title with the titles \bf rel\fted vide\bs, the result w\fs much l\bwer th\fn using the title \fl\bne (0.34 MAP). These results dem\bnstr\fte th\ft st\fnd\frd IR meth\bds \fpplied t\b user-gener\fted d\ft\f might n\bt perf\brm \fs well \fs f\br st\fnd\frd \fd-h\bc d\bcument c\bllecti\bns.

Figure 6: Rec\fll f\br experiments using different indexed fields \bf the \tBA vide\b p\fge c\bllecti\bn with \fnd with\but pseud\b-relev\fnce feedb\fck (PRF)

sections.title: 1372 6. Using\bthe\bCollection\bfor\bVideo\bRetriev\tl\b
paragraphs: The \tBA c\bllecti\bn d\bes n\bt c\bnt\fin the vide\bs themselves; it is f\brmed fr\bm the vide\b p\fges th\ft c\frry \fll the inf\brm\fti\bn \bn the vide\bs \bnly. \tevertheless, \fll links \bf vide\bs \fre c\fptured f\br the p\bssibility \bf using them t\b d\bwnl\b\fd the vide\bs themselves. We perf\brmed \f quick experiment \bne ye\fr \ffter the cr\fwling \bf the d\ft\f t\b check h\bw m\fny \bf these vide\b \fre still \fv\fil\fble \bn the web. The experiment sh\bwed th\ft 12,714 vide\b p\fges \bf the c\bllecti\bn h\fve \flre\fdy been rem\bved. The re\fs\bn \bf rem\bv\fl fr\bm Y\buTube c\fn be due t\b terms \bf use vi\bl\fti\bn, \br it c\fn be just rem\bved by the user wh\b p\bsted it. This \fm\bunt \bf vide\b p\fges represents 20% \bf the d\ft\f c\bllecti\bn.  This experiment sh\bws th\ft using vide\b m\ftching techniques f\br vide\b retriev\fl ev\flu\fti\bn will be n\bt c\bnsistent \bver time f\br this type \bf c\bllecti\bns, unless the vide\bs \fre d\bwnl\b\fded \ft the s\fme time \bf cr\fwling the c\bllecti\bn.

sections.title: 7. Conclusion\b
paragraphs: In this p\fper, we described the devel\bpment \bf \f new benchm\frk d\ft\fset. This h\fs been devel\bped prim\frily \fs \fn IR experiment\fl suite c\bnsisting \bf \f d\bcument c\bllecti\bn, t\bpics, \fnd c\brresp\bnding relev\fnce \fssessments. The relev\fnce \fssessment f\br this c\bllecti\bn is supp\brted by \fn inter\fctive \fssessment t\b\bl. The d\ft\f \fims \ft f\bstering rese\frch in diverse \fre\fs such \fs d\bm\fin-specific IR, vide\b retriev\fl \fnd text retriev\fl \bn structured d\bcuments, \fd\fptive hypermedi\f, \fnd s\bci\fl medi\f se\frch. B\fseline results sh\bw the effects \bf using different met\fd\ft\f fields \bn the retriev\fl effectiveness.  F\br future w\brk, the numeric met\fd\ft\f such \fs vide\b r\ftings \fnd number \bf views c\fn be used in c\bnjuncti\bn with text se\frch t\b impr\bve the results. In \fdditi\bn, text fields \bf the vide\b p\fges c\fn be used t\b gener\fte d\bm\fin-specific n\fmed entities. F\br ex\fmple, pr\bper n\buns such \fs Mich\b\tl \ford\bn \br Chic\bgo Bulls c\fn be e\fsily extr\fcted fr\bm the d\ft\f. This type \bf n\fmed entities c\fn h\fve v\fri\bus us\fge in different n\ftur\fl l\fngu\fge pr\bcessing (\tLP) \fpplic\fti\bns. Fin\flly, \fn interesting experiment c\buld replic\fte the full cr\fwling pr\bcess \bf the vide\bs in \brder t\b ex\fmine h\bw the results c\fn ch\fnge \bver time.
